thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Global Graphics FY Operating Loss Narrows To ‍0.3​ Million Euros

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Global Graphics FY Operating Loss Narrows To ‍0.3​ Million Euros
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - GLOBAL GRAPHICS SE:
* FY OPERATING LOSS EUR ‍0.3​ MILLION VERSUS LOSS EUR 0.7 MILLION YEAR AGO
* FY REVENUE EUR 20.5 MILLION VERSUS EUR 16.0 MILLION YEAR AGO
* FY ADJUSTED NET PROFIT EUR 1.8 MILLION VERSUS EUR 3.7 MILLION YEAR AGO‍​
* ‍EXPECTS CONTINUED GROWTH IN 2018 WITH EVEN STRONGER SYNERGIES BETWEEN OPERATING COMPANIES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
